title: Pasta With Tuna
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add minced garlic, and sauté until fragrant.
Add canned tuna and mix well.
Stir in cooked pasta, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve warm.

title: Baked Rigatoni
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook rigatoni according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Mix cooked pasta with marinara sauce, olive oil, and Italian seasoning.
Transfer the pasta mixture to a baking dish. Sprinkle mozzarella and Parmesan cheese on top.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until cheese is bubbly and golden.
Serve hot.

title: Colorful Tomato and Spinach Seafood Pasta
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add minced garlic and chili flakes, and sauté for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Stir in cherry tomatoes and spinach. Cook until spinach wilts.
Add cooked spaghetti, salt, and pepper. Toss to combine.
Serve warm.

title: Rustic Red Wine Spaghetti
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water for 5 minutes (half-cooked). Drain and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add garlic and red pepper flakes, and sauté until fragrant.
Add red wine to the pan and bring to a simmer.
Add the half-cooked spaghetti and continue cooking until the wine is absorbed and pasta is al dente.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with Parmesan cheese and serve warm.

title: Almost Guilt Free Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a saucepan, heat olive oil and stir in the whole wheat flour. Cook for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in skim milk and mustard powder. Cook until the sauce thickens.
Remove from heat and stir in shredded cheddar cheese until melted.
Mix the cheese sauce with the cooked macaroni.
Serve warm and enjoy.

title: Chicken Noodle Casserole Dish
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook egg noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a bowl, mix cream of mushroom soup, milk, frozen vegetables, salt, and pepper.
Combine the cooked noodles, shredded chicken, and soup mixture. Transfer to a casserole dish.
Sprinkle breadcrumbs and shredded cheese on top.
Bake for 25 minutes or until the top is golden and bubbly.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken and Miso Ramen Noodle Soup
ingredients: Green onions and sesame seeds for garnish
instructions: Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pot, bring chicken broth to a boil. Stir in miso paste and soy sauce.
Add chicken slices and cook for 5 minutes or until tender.
Add bok choy and mushrooms to the broth and simmer for 3 minutes.
Divide the cooked noodles into bowls. Pour the hot broth over the noodles.
Top with boiled egg halves, green onions, and sesame seeds.
Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Parmesan With Pasta
instructions: Preheat the oven to 190°C (375°F).
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Coat in beaten egg, then breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan cheese.
Heat olive oil in a pan and fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides.
Place fried chicken in a baking dish. Top with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve chicken over cooked spaghetti.

title: Homestyle Chicken Noodle Casserole
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook egg noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a bowl, mix cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, mixed vegetables, salt, and pepper.
Combine the cooked noodles, cubed chicken, and soup mixture. Transfer to a casserole dish.
Top with shredded cheddar cheese and crushed crackers.
Bake for 30 minutes or until the top is golden and bubbly.
Serve hot and enjoy.

title: Stir Fried Quinoa, Brown Rice and Chicken Breast
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, and bell peppers)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add chicken slices and cook until no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
Stir in mixed vegetables and cook for another 3 minutes.
Add cooked quinoa and brown rice to the pan, mixing well.
Drizzle soy sauce over the mixture and stir to combine.
Cook for an additional 2 minutes and season with salt and pepper.
Serve warm.

title: Mexican Chicken & Rice Bowl
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add diced chicken breast and cook until golden and fully cooked, about 8 minutes.
Stir in taco seasoning and mix well to coat the chicken.
Add black beans, corn, and salsa to the pan and cook for 5 minutes.
Serve the chicken mixture over cooked rice.
Optional: Garnish with cilantro or a dollop of sour cream before serving.

title: Chinese Chicken Salad With Chipotle Dressing
instructions: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, shredded chicken, carrots, almonds, and sesame seeds.
In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, chipotle sauce, honey, rice vinegar, and a pinch of salt until smooth.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to coat.
Top with crispy wonton strips before serving.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Blast Of Color Mexican Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 4 large bell peppers (any color), halved and deseeded
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Heat olive oil in a pan and cook ground chicken or turkey until browned.
Stir in taco seasoning, black beans, corn, and cooked rice. Cook for 3 minutes.
Place the bell pepper halves in a baking dish and fill them with the mixture.
Top each stuffed pepper with shredded cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until the peppers are tender and the cheese is melted.
Serve warm, garnished with fresh cilantro if desired.

title: Cranberry Pecan Greek Yogurt Chicken Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine shredded chicken, cranberries, and pecans.
In a separate bowl, mix Greek yogurt, honey, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the chicken mixture and toss until evenly coated.
Serve chilled, on its own or in a sandwich or wrap.

title: Grilled Chicken Gyros With Tzatziki
instructions: Marinate chicken slices with olive oil, oregano, salt, and pepper for 10 minutes.
Grill the chicken on medium heat until fully cooked, about 8-10 minutes.
Warm the pita breads on the grill or in a pan.
Assemble the gyros by adding lettuce, tomato, cucumber, grilled chicken, and a generous dollop of tzatziki sauce to each pita.
Roll up and serve warm.

title: Garbanzo Beans & Greens
ingredients: 1 can (400g) garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add garbanzo beans and smoked paprika, cooking for 3-4 minutes.
Stir in chopped greens and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve warm.

title: Sprouted Grain Chicken Pesto Sandwich
instructions: Spread pesto sauce on one side of each slice of bread.
Layer grilled chicken, provolone cheese, and spinach leaves on one slice.
Top with the other slice of bread to form a sandwich.
Toast the sandwich in a pan or sandwich press until the bread is golden and the cheese is melted.
Serve warm.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala Indian
instructions: Marinate chicken cubes in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 20 minutes.
Heat butter in a pan and sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add marinated chicken and cook until lightly browned.
Stir in tomato puree and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add heavy cream and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Serve with steamed rice or naan bread.

title: BahnMi Meatball Sub
instructions: In a bowl, mix ground meat, soy sauce, fish sauce, sesame oil, and ginger. Form into small meatballs.
Cook the meatballs in a pan over medium heat until browned and fully cooked.
Toast the baguette portions until lightly crispy.
Fill each baguette with meatballs, pickled carrots and radishes, cucumber slices, and fresh cilantro.
Serve immediately with a side of spicy chili sauce if desired.

title: Strawberry-Mango Quinoa Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, strawberries, and mango.
Add crumbled feta and chopped mint leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss gently to combine and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Spicy Salad with Kidney Beans, Cheddar, and Nuts
ingredients: 1 can (400g) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, combine kidney beans, bell peppers, and red onion.
Add grated cheddar cheese and chopped nuts.
Drizzle with olive oil and hot sauce.
Sprinkle with smoked paprika, salt, and pepper.
Toss well to coat and serve immediately.

title: Spinach Salad with Strawberry Vinaigrette
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, honey, salt, and pepper to make the vinaigrette.
In a large salad bowl, combine spinach, sliced strawberries, and toasted almonds.
Drizzle the vinaigrette over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Top with crumbled goat cheese and serve immediately.

title: Masala-Tofu Burger
ingredients: Lettuce leaves and sliced tomatoes for serving
instructions: In a bowl, mix crumbled tofu, breadcrumbs, onions, garam masala, turmeric powder, cilantro, and salt.
Shape the mixture into burger patties.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the patties until golden brown on both sides.
Toast the burger buns lightly in the same pan.
Assemble the burgers with lettuce, sliced tomatoes, and the masala-tofu patties.
Serve hot with ketchup or chutney.

title: Bouillabaisse: A Delicious Fisherman's Stew Originating in France
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté onions and garlic until softened.
Add diced tomatoes and cook until they break down into a sauce.
Pour in white wine and let it simmer for 5 minutes.
Add fish stock, saffron, paprika, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil.
Add seafood to the pot and simmer for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot with crusty bread.

title: Golden Potato and Caramelized Onion Flat Bread Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Spread olive oil over the flatbread.
Layer thinly sliced potatoes over the base and season with salt, pepper, and thyme.
Top with caramelized onions and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Potato and Scallion Bread Rolls
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a mixing bowl, combine mashed potatoes, chopped scallions, flour, baking powder, salt, and garlic powder.
Add melted butter and egg, mixing to form a soft dough.
Shape the dough into small rolls and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.
Serve warm with butter or a dipping sauce.
